label: A3B4_mC14_12_ai_2i-002
title: Brezinaite (Cr$_{3}$S$_{4}$) Structure
comments:
(Jellinek, 1957) gives this structure in the $I2/m$ setting of space group \#12.  We used FINDSYM to change this to the standard $C2/m$ setting.  When doing this the shape of the conventional cell changes from that found in the original paper, but of course the Wigner-Seitz cells are identical. 
 Cr$_{3}$Sn$_{4}$ and \href{current_web_home_dir/A3B4_mC14_12_ai_2i-001}{$\delta$-Ni$_{3}$Sn$_{4}$ ($D7_{a}$)} have the same AFLOW prototype label, A3B4\_mC14\_12\_ai\_2i. They are generated by the same symmetry operations with different sets of parameters ({\tt --params}) specified in their corresponding CIF files.
